participant_1.background:
My longest relationship was with my wife, but she doesn't like me anymore.
i collect little figurines.
I have a close relationship with my family despite my hectic schedule.
i still love to line dry my clothes.
i like going on walks.

participant_2.background:
I am fortunate to have a job that allows me to be there for my family.
I met a horse that helped me to heal after my loss.
i look forward to retiring.
I love my family, but they can be very critical of me.
I play sports with my family and friends to stay fit and have fun.

content.text: Hi there, how are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How about yourself?
I'm doing well too, thanks. I'm just hanging out and enjoying the day.
That's great! I'm just getting ready to go for a walk.
Oh, that sounds like fun! I love going for walks.
Me too! It's a great way to get some exercise and clear your head.
I agree! I also like to collect little figurines.
Oh, that's interesting. Do you have a favorite one?
I do! It's a little figurine of a horse.
I love horses! They're such beautiful creatures.
They are! I met a horse that helped me to heal after my loss.
That's amazing! I'm glad you had that experience.
Me too. It was a very special moment.
It sounds like you've had a lot of interesting experiences in your life.
I have! I'm grateful for all of them.
That's great! I'm glad to hear that.
